name: Kin: Paperback Bonus Content
description:
This download contains the bonus content included in the Digital Edition of Kin: The Fantasy Tabletop Role-playing Game and has been released separately for buyers of the paperback (and anyone else interested).

It includes quick reference sheets for both the Game Master and players, the maps included in the game, a character sheet (including a fillable PDF version), and the Gardens of Dusk Point playable short adventure where players will work at and explore the mysterious monastary of Dusk Point and unravel a plot against the Fey Wanderer worshipped there.

If you have already purchased the Digital Edition of Kin, then you already have all the content included here.
